medium: Pen and brown ink, brown wash heightened with white
creditline: Bequest of Dan Fellows Platt, Class of 1895
markings:
Stamp in blue, lower left, on mount: [initial P inscribed in a diamond] [Lugt 2066b]
Stamp in black, lower left: [initials SRIR inscribed in a square] [Lugt 2364]
Stamp in black, lower right: [initial A surmounted by a crown inscribed in a circle] [Lugt 58]
Stamp in black, verso, lower left: [circle with initials D.F.P.] [Lugt 750a]
inscribed:
In ink, lower right, on mount: b: 1555. d: 1619. School of Bologna
In ink, lower center, on mount: Lodovico Carracci
In graphite, verso, lower right: A. 48 L. Carracci | #229 Ederheimer Sale | 1929 | "M.dna appearing to a Saint" | (E: Sir Joshua Reynolds + the Earl of Aylesford Coll.) [in Platt hand]
